metadata.name: escrow
metadata.description: On-chain escrow engine with milestone-based payments on Solana

accounts.name: payer
docs: Anyone can crank this permissionless instruction.

accounts.name: beneficiary_token_account
docs: Beneficiary token account for dispute timeout 50/50 split.

accounts.name: fee_collector_token_account
docs: Fee collector token account for dispute timeout fee.

accounts.name: payer
docs: Anyone can crank this instruction after milestone is approved.

accounts.name: payer
docs: Permissionless — anyone can call this after the receipt NFT is burned.

accounts.name: receipt_mint
docs: The receipt mint PDA — must match escrow_state.receipt_mint and have supply == 0.

accounts.name: payer
docs: Permissionless — anyone can call this to sync the beneficiary.

accounts.name: receipt_mint
docs: The receipt mint PDA — must match escrow_state.receipt_mint.

accounts.name: receipt_token_account
docs: The token account currently holding the receipt NFT (amount must be 1).

accounts.name: beneficiary
docs: Current beneficiary must sign to transfer their claim.

errors.name: NotEscrowParty
errors.msg: Signer is not a party (maker, taker, or beneficiary) of this escrow

errors.name: NotMaker
errors.msg: Signer is not the maker of this escrow

errors.name: NotAuthority
errors.msg: Signer is not the config authority

errors.name: NotBeneficiary
errors.msg: Signer is not the current beneficiary

errors.name: MintMismatch
errors.msg: Token mint does not match escrow mint

errors.name: OwnerMismatch
errors.msg: Token account owner does not match expected owner

errors.name: FeeCollectorMismatch
errors.msg: Fee collector token account does not match config

errors.name: InvalidFeeRate
errors.msg: Fee rate must be <= 10000 basis points

errors.name: InvalidMilestoneCount
errors.msg: Milestone count must be between 1 and 5

errors.name: MilestoneIndexOutOfBounds
errors.msg: Milestone index out of bounds

errors.name: MilestoneAmountMismatch
errors.msg: Sum of milestone amounts must equal total escrow amount

errors.name: InvalidExpiration
errors.msg: Expiration must be in the future

errors.name: EscrowNotActive
errors.msg: Escrow is not in Active status

errors.name: EscrowExpired
errors.msg: Escrow has expired

errors.name: MilestoneNotPending
errors.msg: Milestone is not in Pending status

errors.name: MilestoneNotApproved
errors.msg: Milestone is not in Approved status

errors.name: DisputeAlreadyActive
errors.msg: A dispute is already active on this escrow

errors.name: DisputeNotActive
errors.msg: No active dispute on this escrow

errors.name: InvalidDisputeResolution
errors.msg: Invalid dispute resolution: split basis points must be <= 10000

errors.name: EscrowNotExpired
errors.msg: Escrow has not expired yet

errors.name: NoRefundableAmount
errors.msg: No refundable amount available

errors.name: Overflow
errors.msg: Arithmetic overflow

errors.name: EscrowNotTerminal
errors.msg: Escrow must be in a terminal state (Completed, Cancelled, or Expired)

errors.name: InvalidAmount
errors.msg: Escrow amount must be greater than zero

errors.name: InvalidDisputeTimeout
errors.msg: Dispute timeout must be greater than zero

errors.name: SelfEscrow
errors.msg: Maker and taker cannot be the same address

errors.name: InvalidBeneficiary
errors.msg: Cannot transfer claim to maker or zero address

errors.name: ExtendedMintNotSupported
errors.msg: Extended mints (with transfer fees) are not supported

errors.name: InvalidAuthority
errors.msg: Authority cannot be set to the zero address

errors.name: InvalidFeeCollector
errors.msg: Fee collector cannot be the zero address

errors.name: ReceiptAlreadyMinted
errors.msg: NFT receipt has already been minted for this escrow

errors.name: InsufficientBalance
errors.msg: Insufficient token balance to fund the escrow

errors.name: ReceiptExists
errors.msg: Receipt NFT exists — use NFT transfer + sync_beneficiary instead of transfer_claim

errors.name: BeneficiaryAlreadySynced
errors.msg: Beneficiary is already synced with the current NFT holder

errors.name: InvalidReceiptHolder
errors.msg: Receipt token account holder is invalid (must not be maker or zero address)

errors.name: BeneficiaryNotSynced
errors.msg: Beneficiary is not synced with current receipt NFT holder — call sync_beneficiary first

errors.name: ReceiptNotBurned
errors.msg: Receipt NFT has not been burned (supply > 0) — cannot revoke

errors.name: MintHasFreezeAuthority
errors.msg: Mints with a freeze authority are not supported (vault freeze griefing risk)

types.name: MilestoneInput
docs: Input struct for creating milestones (used as instruction argument).
